question: 胸
sourceAnswer: chest/breast | breasts/bosom/bust | heart | lungs | stomach | heart/mind/feelings
userAnswer: chest/breast | breasts/bosom | heart | lungs | stomach | heart-mind
activeAnswer: chest/breast | breasts/bosom | heart | lungs | stomach | heart-mind
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This vocab word uses the same reading as the one you learned with the kanji. At least I won't have to bring up the image of you <reading>moon</reading>ing (<ja>むね</ja>) people with your breasts or whatnot. Oh dang, I just went and did it.
